'''3.20.7''' is an update to the [[Minecraft Launcher]] that was released on September 30th, 2025.

== Changes ==
* Changed the {{JE}} and {{BE}} play section to match the theme of ''[[The Copper Age]]''.
* Changed the home button to be animated, showing a video of the copper golem.
* The Home section has been changed to include news about ''[[The Copper Age]]''.
